com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl

Class AbstractEncryptionCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl.AbstractEncryptionCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncryptionCodec, Serializable

    public abstract class AbstractEncryptionCodec
extends Object
implements EncryptionCodec
    Abstract base class that contains everything an EncryptionCodec needs to do apart from the actual encrypt and decrypt routines, which are cipher specific.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected byte[] decodeInternal(byte[] bytes)
      Base64 decodes the supplied string and strips the encrypted length and separator, for example .52|, from the front of the byte array.
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] bytes)
      This method should firstly Base64 decode bytes, then decrypt it and finally inflate it.
      protected abstract byte[] decryptInternal(byte[] bytes)
      Decrypt the given byte array.
      protected byte[] deflateInternal(byte[] bytes)
      Deflates the passed in String and prefixes the result with AUTN: before returning.
      protected byte[] encodeInternal(byte[] encrypted)
      Base64 encodes the supplied byte array, firstly prefixing the length of the byte array and a separator character.
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] bytes)
      This method should firstly deflate bytes, then encrypt it and finally Base64 encode it.
      protected abstract byte[] encryptInternal(byte[] bytes)
      Encrypt the given byte array.
      protected byte[] inflateInternal(byte[] bytes)
      Strip the AUTN: prefix and inflate the given byte[] to it's original form.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] bytes)
               throws EncryptionCodecException
        This method should firstly deflate bytes, then encrypt it and finally Base64 encode it.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface EncryptionCodec
        Parameters:
        bytes - An array of bytes to encrypt
        Returns:
        A Base64 encoded, encrypted, deflated copy of the input array
        Throws:
        EncryptionCodecException - if there was a problem during any of the three stages of processing

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] bytes)
               throws EncryptionCodecException
        This method should firstly Base64 decode bytes, then decrypt it and finally inflate it.
        Specified by:
        decrypt in interface EncryptionCodec
        Parameters:
        bytes - A Base64 encoded, encrypted and deflated array of bytes
        Returns:
        The original unencrypted content as a byte array
        Throws:
        EncryptionCodecException - if there was a problem during any of the three stages of processing

      • deflateInternal

        protected byte[] deflateInternal(byte[] bytes)
                          throws EncryptionCodecException
        Deflates the passed in String and prefixes the result with AUTN: before returning.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte array to deflate
        Returns:
        The deflated string prefixed with AUTN: as a byte array
        Throws:
        EncryptionCodecException - If an error occurred during processing

      • encodeInternal

        protected byte[] encodeInternal(byte[] encrypted)
                         throws EncryptionCodecException
        Base64 encodes the supplied byte array, firstly prefixing the length of the byte array and a separator character.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - The encrypted byte array to Base64 encode
        Returns:
        The Base64 encoded byte array
        Throws:
        EncryptionCodecException - If an error occurred during processing

      • decodeInternal

        protected byte[] decodeInternal(byte[] bytes)
                         throws EncryptionCodecException
        Base64 decodes the supplied string and strips the encrypted length and separator, for example .52|, from the front of the byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The Base64 encoded byte array to decode
        Returns:
        The decoded byte array
        Throws:
        EncryptionCodecException - If an error occurred during processing
